column4: hey, my friend just installed xubuntu, and when she does "sudo apt-get update" she gets a segmentation fault
since i am not a ubuntu user i'd love some help
OK. Never heard of that one. Sorry.
that is what she said from the phone to me
and from what i know it is a clean xubuntu installation
Has she tried aptitude? (running out of ideas)
no, but i never used that either, should a reinstall fix it?
maybe. but try <<sudo aptitude update && sudo aptitude safe-upgrade>> first
safe upgrade? what does that do?
i still have to call her
still thinking of a reinstall is easier for her
OK. If that doesn't work, I really don't have any more ideas. Tell her to try the forums and post the complete error message.
well that is what she told me :s
